title: Richard Dawkins - Wikipedia
snippet: He is an emeritus fellow of New College, Oxford. In 1995 he was named the first Simonyi Professor for the Public Understanding of Science, a position he held until 2008, and is on the advisory board of the University of Austin. Dawkins has won several academic and writing awards, among them ...

title: Professor Richard Dawkins FRS
snippet: Richard Dawkins is an evolutionary biologist and expert in animal behaviour. Richard is well known for his ability to communicate concepts from his research and beyond to a non-specialist audience. Thus he has been a key figure in raising public understanding of science.

title: Richard Dawkins CV: Academic Achievements | PDF
snippet: It outlines his professional positions including being a Research Assistant to Professor N. Tinbergen FRS from 1965-1967 and Assistant Professor of Zoology at University of California, Berkeley from 1967-1969.

title: Richard Dawkins: Social Sciences and Humanities H-index & Awards - Academic Profile | Research.com
snippet: The various areas that Richard Dawkins examines in his Darwinism study include Environmental ethics and Genealogy.

title: Richard Dawkins - Students | Britannica Kids | Homework Help
snippet: In 1995 Dawkins was made the Charles Simonyi professor of public understanding of science at Oxford University. In this position he continued to publish prolifically and produced an array of television programs.
